website_summaries.verdict: These durable, high-quality burrs can handle almost anything – except for soft materials like aluminum, which often clog them up.
pros: Set of 10 carbide burrs of assorted style heads
Includes SA-1, SC-1, SD-3, SH-1, SF-3, SA-3, SC-3, SC-5, SF-5, and SA-5
Easy to keep organized in holder
Little vibration even at top RPMs
cons: These don't work as well with aluminum, brass, and softer metals because they can clog up the flutes

customer_reviews.title: Wow !  Awesome burrs
customer_reviews.text: Bought a lot of cheapo burrs in the past, and they don't compare at all to these. Amazing cutting action. Haven't used them much, but what I've seen so far, I'm very impressed with.. And made in USA... which is one of the reasons I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: TW Renovator

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: These are the best I’ve ever used. Don’t apply pressure just let the tool do the work as you should. The price is awesome as well. Compared to Mac tools these are the better of the two
customer_reviews.author: April Burton

customer_reviews.title: Good deal on very high quality tools
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these burrs to do some clean-up work on the insides of several MGB blocks and to modify several cast iron heads and an aluminum MGB head. They work great, remove plenty of material easily, don't clog and are very easy and consistent to use. I recommend them highly! This vendor also packaged the set quite well and it arrived at my door very promptly - a good purchase to be sure!
customer_reviews.author: SteveH

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of carbide burrs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for $89.99, at $9.00 a burr a very good deal. Burrs made in the U.S. and work well to rapidly remove mild steel, enlarging or slotting holes etc. Set contains the most frequently used shapes, in a serviceable wood holder. Tool balance seems to be pretty good, little vibration even at full RPM. Would buy again if this set becomes available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USA made
customer_reviews.text: look good and they are made in the U.S.A. instead of China
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Almost too hard of a carbide
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Almost too hard of a carbide. Chattered 1 time with a small endmill in a hole and lost half of the teeth.
customer_reviews.author: michael t.

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this product.
customer_reviews.text: I debated hard between getting this US made product vs a cheaper similar import brand. Happy to say that I have been very pleased with the Kodiak. They are very sharp, high quality, and a pleasure to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome burrs
customer_reviews.text: Blown away buy the quality. Bought them mainly because there USA made. A lot of bang for your buck. 10 burrs for the price you would only get a set of 4 from the tool trucks.

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Cost more but works. My experience with carbide tooling, when you need it to work well, you have to pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHERM

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this set for 2 years and they are still like new. I use them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice burs, run them fasr, wow, so much better than my cheap ones
customer_reviews.author: G8trwood

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: everything as it seems.No surprises. They spun true without vibration. We primarily use them to dress up stainless steel parts. Which are hard on carbide burs.They hold up as well as much more expensive cutters
customer_reviews.author: Lou Fairbairn

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed had a bit in my 12 volt drill low speed and broke were the bit meets the shaft within a minute or two
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kloton

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Got the job done! needed to grind down some stainless spokes on a Harley rim I relaced.
customer_reviews.author: 69 Localboy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. I would definitely refer to anyone interested in this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I will defiantly be a returning customer for Kodiak Cutting Tools!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Stivers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting bits! Would definitely recommend this kit! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: AmAndA S GriGGs

customer_reviews.title: The best I have seen at a great price
customer_reviews.text: True quality cutters. The best I have seen at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Carl P.-

product_meta.title: Kodiak Cutting Tools 4J-518Y-JQ3L USA Made Carbide Bur Set on 1/4" Shanks, Assorted (Pack of 10)
product_meta.description: This carbide bur set features high quality double-cut USA made Kodiak brand carbide burrs which are made from premium carbide. This kit contains 10 burs in assorted style heads on 1/4" shanks for a wide variety of grinding and deburring tasks. Assortment includes double-cut burs on a 1/4" shank in the following shapes and head diameter sizes: SA-1 1/4" cylindrical bur (non end-cutting) SC-1 1/4" cylindrical ball nose bur SD-3 3/8" ball shape bur SH-1 1/4" flame shape bur SF-3 3/8" round nose tree shaped bur SA-3 3/8" cylindrical bur (non end-cutting) SC-3 3/8" cylindrical ball nose bur SC-5 1/2" cylindrical ball nose bur SF-5 1/2" round nose tree shape bur SA-5 1/2" cylindrical bur (non end-cutting)wooden stand.
